channel.title: Law on Lyon's Field Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Law on Lyon's Field Notes

item.title: Criminalising anti-feminism
item.description: I’m an egalitarian—I believe that men and women are equal and deserve equal rights and opportunities. So I can’t agree with feminism—the belief that women are entitled to preferential treatment today to compensate for the wrongs of yesterday1. Now, I don’t know if you agree with my view. But I hold it in good faith, with as much concern for issues that affect women as I have for the issues that affect men.
